p: So far, there has been no effective treatment of COVID-19. Several potential drug candidates, including lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), nucleoside analogs, neuraminidase inhibitors, remdesivir, umifenovir (arbidol), DNA synthesis inhibitors (such as tenofovir disoproxil, and lamivudine), chloroquine, and Chinese traditional medicine (such as ShuFengJieDu or Lianhuaqingwen capsules), have been proposed. [ 8, 9]
